info_section:
This map displays where formal peace agreements have been signed in the last year, represented by the agreement icon and the levels of estimated conflict-related fatalities per country in the last 12 months represented by the colored country polygons. The darker the color of the country, the more estimated fatalities. Hover the icon or country for more information on the data shown, or click on a country for more data to be shown. The data driving this application are as follows:
  • Peace process and peace agreement data, from the PA-X Peace Agreements Database - Bell, C., & Badanjak, S. (2019). Introducing PA-X: A new peace agreement database and dataset. Journal of Peace Research, 56(3), 452-466. Available at https://www.peaceagreements.org/, (V9).
  • Estimated fatalities from political violence events, from the Armed Conflict Location Event Data (ACLED) via the Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX). The HDX dataset was last updated on 2026-01-21; this globe uses data through 2025-12-31 (latest fully completed month).
  • Displacement data from Internal Displacement Monitoring Centre (IDMC), last updated on 21 July 2025
  • Food insecurity data from Integrated Food Insecurity Classification (IPC), last updated on 23 January 2026
  • Global Peace Index, from the Vision of Humanity, last updated on 2024 - Global Peace Index: Institute for Economics & Peace. Global Peace Index 2022: Measuring Peace in a Complex World, Sydney, June 2022. Available from: http://visionofhumanity.org/resources.
  • Corruption Perception Index, from the Transparency International, last updated on 2024 - Corruption Perception Index (CPI) [2024] by Transparency International is licensed under CC-BYND 4.0. View here: https://www.transparency.org/en/cpi/2024.
  • INFORM Severity Index, from the ACAPS, last updated on 31/12/2025.
  • National Action Plan information taken from the UK Government WPS NAP - UK Women, Peace and Security National Action Plan 2023-2027.
